name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Staff Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **Ruby**, **Rails**, **Python**, and **TypeScript**, specializing in building high-performance, scalable solutions. My deep expertise in AI/ML technologies allows me to integrate large language models and prompt engineering into robust applications, ensuring performance optimization, reliability, and scalability. I have a strong foundation in API design and distributed systems, coupled with experience in database design, including **graph databases** and **knowledge graph systems**.
I am adept at providing technical mentorship and guiding teams through strategic technical decisions while fostering effective communication. My proficiency in developing machine learning pipelines and deploying AI agent systems, along with contributions to **open source**, underlines my commitment to continuous learning and innovation. Additionally, I leverage tools like **static analyzers**, **code analysis tools**, and **abstract syntax trees** to enhance code quality and observability in complex systems.
